We don't even fly the US flag here - everyone flies the Texas state flag at full mast. :-)
Personally I think the State of Texas flag is nicer ... less busy - simple red white and blue with a big star. It also makes a great pattern for swim trunks. 


On Feb 25, 2005, at 1:11 PM, Dan Lowe wrote:



On Feb 25, 2005, at 11:47 AM, Nicholas Cancelliere wrote:
A bit of trivia ... the Texas State Capital dome is larger than the US, it's the only state in the Union that is. There's supposedly a law that says no state capital dome can be bigger/taller than the US one ... but we really are our own country down here. I heard also that the Texas constitution has a provision in it that it is allowed to leave the Union at will. :-)
I'm pretty sure that's true. Texas is also the only state in the union allowed to fly its state flag at the same height as the national flag. 

 -dan
